title: Life After
description: People are changing into werewolves all over the country. Men, women, and children are being killed. The human population of the United States is plummeting.Randi and surviving members of her family escape the city and take refuge in the deserted grasslands. They think they’ll be safe from the horrors destroying civilization until it comes knocking on their front door.Many will die in the now apocalyptic United States. Many will be changed forever into something which shouldn’t exist. Love, death, and new life will be found in the wasteland.This is the story of Randi and her family’s everyday struggles. Beware surviving in this new world can be very dangerous and bloody.
author: Mercedes Fox
